body:
I do not understand what do you mean.


![image](https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/assets/2114189/c1fed4b3-4987-4ee3-a603-cf2b66f52a72)

I do not know what you are talking about.

![image](https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/assets/2114189/e42362c8-34b7-43ca-bd89-25a3995bb31a)

Ah, my deepest apologies! Was this a recent addition perhaps? It seems like Codeberg is still based on too old Gitea code to show this. In any case, seems like this ticket is invalid, I'm sorry about that.

Hmm .... good point. 

I guess there is a bug. Maybe in some cases, the "delete" menu doesn't show. I will look into it.

Thank you for your report!

rename.from: Not possible to edit older versions of comments with confidential info
rename.to: Issue edit history sometimes doesn't show the "Delete from history" menu.

body: Oh, I'm surprised this isn't just me not checking the server version properly :sweat_smile: :joy:

issue.title: Improve issue history dialog and make poster can delete their own history

And some UI improvements:

body:
The problem is in `canSoftDeleteContentHistory`, the `CanWrite` check was incorrect.

->  Improve issue history dialog and make poster can delete their own history #27323 

Thank you again.
